plot: Caillou and Sarah are playing together when Caillou notices his friend wiggling her loose tooth back and forth. Caillou wants to be taller like his friend Andre and tries to think of a way to grow faster. Caillou is excited about the arrival of spring, but he's a little disappointed when Dad says there'll be no more snow. Caillou loves Leo's pet hamster and would really like to have his own.—Anonymous
